content:
Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 28, "index": 20}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 56, "index": 22}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 34, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 34}]

thought: In order to craft a polished_blackstone_pressure_plate, I need to first craft a polished_blackstone. To do so, I need to place blackstone in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move one blackstone from slot 30 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1
